resources.string: Was this the created vibration pattern?
Test finished! You decided correctly for %1$d out of %2$d vibration samples. Please enter the label for the data to be stored.
Please create a new random vibration pattern.
Please play the created pattern %1$d more times to learn how it feels.
%1$s%2$s more samples in the test. Please play the created pattern once more to recap how it feels before continuing.
You may either repeat the pattern further, or decide if another pattern (that we present to you once only) actully is the learned pattern.
Amount of test samples a created vibration sample is compared against.
How often newly created vibration samples have to be repeated before vibration recognition becomes available.
